item.title: 苹果版「Adobe 全家桶」发布，价格不到剪映一半
item.guid: 苹果版「Adobe-全家桶」发布，价格不到剪映一半
item.description:
<Insert Video Account> <插入视频号>

Yesterday, Apple integrated multiple creative tool applications under its umbrella and officially launched the new subscription service, Apple Creator Studio. 昨天，苹果整合旗下多款创意工具应用，正式推出全新的订阅制服务 Apple Creator Studio。

The service bundles a total of 9 applications, including the originally independent iWork suite (Pages, Numbers, and Keynote), the professional video editing suite (Final Cut Pro, Motion, and Compressor), as well as Logic Pro, MainStage, and Pixelmator Pro, offering them to users through a subscription model. 该服务将原本独立的 iWork 套件（Pages、Numbers 和 Keynote）、专业视频剪辑套件（Final Cut Pro、Motion 和 Compressor），以及 Logic Pro、MainStage 和 Pixelmator Pro 共计 9 款应用打包，通过订阅模式向用户提供。

Specific details are as follows: 具体信息如下：

    The subscription price is 38 yuan/month or 380 yuan/year;

    The educational discount price is 18 yuan/month or 180 yuan/year;

    Supports family sharing for up to 6 people;

    Supports all AI features in the tools mentioned above;

    New subscribers get one month free;

    Three months free with the purchase of a new Apple device.

For reference, some of the software in the suite are sold separately as follows: 作为参考，套装中的部分软件单独售价如下：

    Final Cut Pro (RMB 1998)

    Logic Pro (RMB 1298)

    Pixelmator Pro (RMB 328)

    Motion (RMB 328)

    Compressor (RMB 328)

    MainStage (RMB 198)

In comparison, doesn't the subscription price seem a bit "sweet"? After all, even CapCut's premium membership costs over 70 now. 相比之下，是不是订阅的价格看起来也有点「香」？毕竟现在连剪映的高级会员都要 70 多了。

The Chinese version of Apple Creator Studio service will officially launch on January 29 (Thursday). Users can find the integrated link directly in the App Store to subscribe. 国行 Apple Creator Studio 服务将于 1 月 29 日（星期四）正式上线，用户可直接在 App Store 中找到整合链接进行订阅。

item.title: 苹果公布 2025 年服务成绩单：App Store 周活跃用户突破 8.5 亿
item.guid: 苹果公布-2025-年服务成绩单：App-Store-周活跃用户突破-8.5-亿
item.description:
Recently, Apple announced its latest report card for its services business last year. Multiple core services set historical records globally, with comprehensive improvements in business scale, user engagement, and revenue generation. 近日，苹果公布了其去年服务业务的最新成绩单，多个核心服务在全球范围内创下历史纪录，业务规模、用户参与度与营收能力全面提升。

Apple stated that 2025 is a "record-breaking year" for its services business. Core services such as the App Store, Apple Music, Apple Pay, iCloud, and Apple Podcasts all achieved significant growth, experiencing peak user visits and consumption during holiday periods. 苹果表示，2025 年是其服务业务的「破纪录之年」。App Store、Apple Music、Apple Pay、iCloud、Apple 播客等核心服务均实现显著增长，并在节假日期间迎来用户访问与消费高峰。

Apple's official website data shows: 苹果官网数据显示：

    Last year, the App Store had over 850 million average weekly visitors, covering 175 countries and regions. Access in the US, Japan, India, and China markets all set new records. Since its launch in 2008, developers have collectively earned over $550 billion through the App Store;

    Apple Music received a major update on its tenth anniversary, with both total listeners and new subscribers reaching historical highs. Features such as lyric translation, seamless transitions, and library pinning further enhanced the experience;

    Last year, Apple Pay expanded its market coverage to 89 countries, partnering with over 11,000 banks and networks. It prevented over $1 billion in fraudulent transactions throughout the year and drove over $100 billion in incremental merchant sales. During peak holiday shopping seasons, Apple Pay transaction growth significantly outpaced overall consumer spending growth;

    Maps App in iOS 26 adds features like "Preferred Routes" and "Visited Locations," leveraging on-device intelligence to enhance the commuting experience;

    Apple Podcasts celebrates its 20th anniversary, with record-breaking listener numbers, play counts, and subscriptions. The platform introduces AI features like "Highlight Conversations" and awards its annual program prize to the British show "The Rest Is History";

    iCloud continues to ensure user data security with end-to-end encryption and two-factor authentication, and supports up to 5 people sharing an iCloud+ subscription.

Eddy Cue, Apple's Senior Vice President of Internet Software and Services, stated that over the past year, Apple has continuously advanced service innovation and expanded its global reach, and will continue to uphold privacy protection and intelligent development in the future. 苹果服务业务高级副总裁 Eddy Cue 表示，过去一年苹果持续推进服务创新，并在全球范围内扩大覆盖，未来将继续坚持隐私保护与智能化方向。

item.title: 微信澄清通知头像功能讨论：Android 一直都有，iOS 正在灰度
item.guid: 微信澄清通知头像功能讨论：Android-一直都有，iOS-正在灰度
item.description:
Recently, WeChat sparked discussion due to its "notification avatar display" feature. WeChat employee "Kecun Xiao Jiang" posted on Weibo yesterday to clarify, stating that the Android version "has always had" this feature, while some users previously thought it was only launched on the iOS version. 近日，微信因「通知显示头像」功能引发讨论。微信员工「客村小蒋」昨天在微博发文澄清，称安卓端「一直都有」该功能，而此前有用户认为该功能仅在 iOS 端上线。

It is reported that the discussion stemmed from some users discovering a new independent switch for "notification avatar display" on the WeChat iOS version, located in "Settings → Notifications → Notification Content Display." Users can individually control whether to display avatars and message content, balancing privacy and convenience. Currently, this feature is still in grayscale testing on the iOS version. 据悉，相关讨论源于部分用户发现微信 iOS 端近日新增「通知显示头像」的独立开关，位于「设置 → 通知 → 通知显示内容」中，用户可分别控制是否显示头像与是否显示消息内容，以兼顾隐私与便利性。目前，该功能 iOS 端仍在灰度测试。

item.title: DeepSeek 母公司幻方量化去年收益 56.6%，助力新模型研发
item.guid: DeepSeek-母公司幻方量化去年收益-56.6%，助力新模型研发
item.description:
According to a report by "Wall Street Insights" citing data from Private Placement Rankings, DeepSeek's parent company, Fangfang Quant Fund, managed by Liang Wenfeng, recorded an average return of 56.6% last year, with an AUM exceeding 70 billion RMB, ranking second among quantitative funds with an AUM over 10 billion RMB, only behind Lingjun Investment's return of over 70%. 据《华尔街见闻》援引私募排排网数据报道，梁文锋旗下、DeepSeek 母公司幻方量化基金在去年录得平均 56.6% 的收益率，管理规模超过 700 亿元人民币，在管理规模超 100 亿元的量化基金中排名第二，仅次于灵均投资超过 70% 的收益表现。

The report points out that this achievement is closely related to its strategic adjustment in 2024, completely exiting market-neutral strategies and shifting towards a pure long-only product line. 报道指出，这一成绩与其在 2024 年全面退出市场中性策略、转向纯多头产品线的战略调整密切相关。

According to Private Placement Rankings data, products managed by co-founder Xu Jin achieved an average return of 58.6%, while the eight products managed by CEO Lu Zheng had an average increase of 56%. Among these, the equity strategy's Sharpe ratio reached 2.8, ranking among the top quantitative institutions. 排排网数据显示，联合创始人徐进管理的产品平均收益达 58.6%，CEO 陆政管理的八只产品平均涨幅为 56%，其中股票策略夏普比率高达 2.8，位列头部量化机构前列。

Strong fund returns have also directly bolstered DeepSeek's R&D confidence. DeepSeek was incubated by Fangfang in 2023, with Liang Wenfeng holding a majority stake. 强劲的基金回报也直接增强了 DeepSeek 的研发底气。DeepSeek 于 2023 年由幻方孵化，梁文锋持有多数股权。

Industry insiders point out that the fund's high management fees and performance incentives could generate over $700 million in revenue, far exceeding DeepSeek's previously disclosed model R&D budget of less than $6 million. This means DeepSeek will gain stronger resource guarantees in areas such as computing power procurement and team expansion. 业内人士指出，基金的高额管理费与业绩提成可能带来超过 7 亿美元 的收入，远超 DeepSeek 早前披露的不足 600 万美元的模型研发预算。这意味着 DeepSeek 在算力采购、团队扩张等方面将获得更强的资源保障。

According to previous reports, DeepSeek is expected to launch its next-generation large model, DeepSeek V4, around the Chinese New Year, with programming capabilities anticipated to surpass current industry benchmark models. 据此前报道，DeepSeek 预计将在春节前后推出新一代大模型 DeepSeek V4，编程能力有望超越当前行业标杆模型。

item.title: 前腾势总经理赵长江官宣加入智界
item.guid: 前腾势总经理赵长江官宣加入智界
item.description:
Yesterday, former BYD executive Zhao Changjiang announced his joining of Luxeed, a brand under Harmony Intelligent Mobility Alliance, as Executive Director and Executive Vice President of Luxeed Auto. His Weibo verification has also been updated accordingly. 昨天，前比亚迪高管赵长江宣布加入鸿蒙智行旗下智界汽车，出任智界汽车执行董事及执行副总裁，其微博认证也已同步更新。

Zhao Changjiang stated that his 16 years of experience at BYD made him deeply understand the importance of "adhering to user value, technological innovation, and promoting industrial advancement," and he extended his regards to BYD, Chery, and Huawei for their long-term investment in the intelligent transformation of the automotive industry. 赵长江表示，过去在比亚迪的 16 年经历，使其深刻理解「坚守用户价值、技术创新、推动产业进阶」的重要性，并向比亚迪、奇瑞及华为在汽车产业智能化中的长期投入表达致意。

He wrote that he will work with the Luxeed team to build "a user-centric global benchmark intelligent brand" and establish an "AI-era user-friendly system" that spans products, services, and experiences. 他写道，自己将与智界团队共同打造「以用户为中心的全球化标杆智能品牌」，并构建贯穿产品、服务与体验的「AI 时代用户友好体系」。

This official announcement also confirms market rumors about his joining Luxeed since last November. Before officially joining, Zhao Changjiang reposted Yu Chengdong's warm-up video for Luxeed V9 on January 9th, and commented that the model "conservatively has no rivals within three years," further fueling external speculation about his whereabouts. 此次官宣落地，也印证了去年 11 月以来关于其加盟智界的市场传闻。在正式加入前，赵长江曾于 1 月 9 日转发余承东关于智界 V9 的预热视频，并在评论区称该车型「保守估计三年内没有对手」，引发外界对其去向的进一步猜测。

Public records show that Zhao Changjiang was born in 1986 and joined BYD in 2009. He rose from regional sales manager to General Manager of BYD Auto Sales Co., Ltd., leading the marketing efforts for core models such as Han and Tang. 公开资料显示，赵长江出生于 1986 年，2009 年加入比亚迪，从区域销售经理一路晋升至比亚迪汽车销售有限公司总经理，主导汉、唐等多款核心车型的市场工作。

Starting in 2021, he took charge of the Denza brand, driving brand revitalization and channel restructuring, making Denza D9 the long-term sales champion in the new energy luxury MPV market. Last October, he announced his departure from BYD, stating his desire to find a new rhythm between work and life. 2021 年起，他执掌腾势品牌，推动品牌焕新与渠道重构，腾势 D9 成为新能源豪华 MPV 市场的长期销量冠军。去年 10 月，他宣布从比亚迪离职，表示希望在工作与生活间寻找新的节奏。

Luxeed Auto is currently in a phase of product matrix expansion and accelerated channel construction, having set a sales target of one million units by 2030. Zhao Changjiang's experience in channel building, user operations, and brand system establishment is regarded by industry insiders as a crucial complementary force for Luxeed during its expansion phase. 智界汽车当前正处于产品矩阵扩张与渠道加速建设阶段，已提出 2030 年销量达百万辆的目标。赵长江在渠道建设、用户运营及品牌体系搭建方面的经验，被业内视为智界在扩张期的重要补位力量。

He revealed in a recent interview that Luxeed will launch at least 4 new cars this year and plans to build nearly 200 dedicated channels. Concurrently, it will advance a global synchronized product strategy, with the right-hand drive version of Luxeed V9 also set to be launched in the second half of this year. 他在近期采访中透露，智界今年将推出至少 4 款新车，并计划建设接近 200 家专门渠道，同时推进全球同步产品策略，智界 V9 右舵版也将在今年下半年推出。

item.title: 印度拟要求手机厂商交出系统源代码，苹果等巨头强烈反对
item.guid: 印度拟要求手机厂商交出系统源代码，苹果等巨头强烈反对
item.description:
According to Reuters, the Indian government is advancing a regulatory proposal involving 83 mobile security standards. The most controversial aspects include requiring smartphone manufacturers to submit source code to the government for security review and notifying authorities in advance of major system updates. 据路透社报道，印度政府正推进一项涉及 83 项手机安全标准的监管提案，其中最具争议的内容包括 要求智能手机厂商向政府提交源代码进行安全审查 ，并在重大系统更新前向主管部门提前通报。

The plan has drawn strong opposition from Apple, Samsung, Google, Xiaomi, and the Indian industry body MAIT, who argue that such a move lacks global precedent and could leak critical business secrets. 该计划引发苹果、三星、Google、小米及印度行业组织 MAIT 的强烈反对，认为此举缺乏全球先例，且可能泄露关键商业机密。

Meeting minutes between the government and businesses, disclosed by Reuters, show that India's Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology is consulting with several tech companies. S. Krishnan, Secretary of the Indian IT Ministry, stated that the government would address legitimate corporate concerns with an "open mind" but emphasized that discussions are still ongoing. 路透社披露的政府与企业会议纪要显示，印度信息技术部正在与多家科技公司进行磋商。印度 IT 部秘书 S. Krishnan 表示，政府会以「开放的态度」处理企业的合理关切，但强调目前仍处于讨论阶段。

However, despite the government subsequently claiming to "deny considering requesting source code," official documents reviewed by Reuters indeed contain such requirements. 不过，尽管政府随后声称「否认正在考虑索取源代码」，但路透社查阅的官方文件中确实包含相关要求。

According to the document, India plans to require manufacturers to: 根据文件内容，印度拟要求厂商：

    Allow government-designated laboratories to conduct "vulnerability analysis" and "security assessment" of source code;

    Support uninstalling pre-installed applications;

    Restrict applications from accessing the camera and microphone in the background;

    Report to the National Centre for Communication Security before releasing major updates;

    Store system logs locally on the device for at least 12 months.

MAIT stated in a confidential document submitted to the government that source code review is "not feasible" and that no major global market has implemented similar requirements; mandatory regular malware scans would significantly impact battery life, and the update approval mechanism would slow down the release of security patches. MAIT 在提交给政府的保密文件中指出，源代码审查「不可行」，且全球主要市场均未实施类似要求；强制恶意软件定期扫描会显著影响电池续航，而更新审批机制也会拖慢安全补丁发布节奏。

Manufacturers like Apple have explicitly opposed the proposal in internal meetings, emphasizing that source code is a highly sensitive asset rarely disclosed globally. Apple had previously rejected similar requests. 苹果等厂商已在内部会议中明确反对该提案，并强调源代码属于高度敏感资产，全球范围内均极少对外开放。苹果此前也曾拒绝类似要求。

This set of security standards was initially formulated in 2023 and has now regained focus as the government considers incorporating them into a legal framework. Executives from several tech companies are expected to continue consultations with the Indian government. 该套安全标准最初制定于 2023 年，如今因政府考虑将其纳入法律框架而重新成为焦点。多家科技公司高管预计将继续与印度政府磋商。

item.title: OpenAI 官宣收购 AI 医疗应用 Torch，估值约 1 亿美元
item.guid: OpenAI-官宣收购-AI-医疗应用-Torch，估值约-1-亿美元
item.description:
Yesterday, OpenAI officially announced the acquisition of Torch, an AI medical application founded just one year ago. 昨天，OpenAI 官宣收购成立仅一年的 AI 医疗应用 Torch。

According to The Information, citing sources, the equity acquisition is valued at approximately $100 million, including $60 million in upfront value, with the remainder serving as equity incentives to retain employees. 据 The Information 援引知情人士报道，这笔股权收购估值约 1 亿美元，包含 6000 万美元的前期价值，剩余部分将作为股权激励用于留任员工。

Torch's core functionality is to integrate health data from various sources, including healthcare systems like Kaiser Permanente, medical scanning institutions like Prenuvo, and fitness tracking apps like Apple Health, using OpenAI's models to provide personalized medical analysis. Torch 的核心功能是整合来自不同来源的健康数据，包括 Kaiser Permanente 等医疗系统、Prenuvo 等医学扫描机构，以及 Apple Health 等运动追踪应用，并利用 OpenAI 的模型提供个性化的医疗分析。

All four Torch employees, including CEO Ilya Abyzov, plan to join OpenAI. These founders launched Torch last year and also established Forward, a health clinic operator, which closed at the end of 2024. Torch 的四名员工，包括 CEO Ilya Abyzov，均计划加入 OpenAI。这几位创始人在去年推出了 Torch，他们还创立了健康诊所运营商 Forward，但已于 2024 年底关闭。

The report suggests that this acquisition aims to strengthen OpenAI's presence in the personalized health assistant sector. 报道认为，此次收购旨在加强 OpenAI 在个性化健康助手领域的布局。

Last week, OpenAI just announced the launch of ChatGPT Health, allowing users to ask questions based on their medical records and fitness data. OpenAI stated on X that combining Torch with ChatGPT Health "opens up new ways to understand and manage health." 上周，OpenAI 刚刚宣布推出 ChatGPT Health 功能，允许用户基于自身的病历和健身数据提问。OpenAI 在 X 上表示，将 Torch 与 ChatGPT Health 结合「开启了理解和管理健康的新方式」。

Meanwhile, competitors in the AI field are also accelerating their expansion into the healthcare sector. Last weekend, Anthropic launched medical features for its chatbot Claude, also supporting subscribers to connect medical records and fitness data. 与此同时，AI 领域的竞争对手也在加速布局医疗赛道。上周末，Anthropic 为其聊天机器人 Claude 推出了医疗功能，同样支持订阅用户连接病历和健身数据。

For OpenAI, the Torch team possesses valuable technical experience in processing and integrating disparate and conflicting medical data (e.g., integrating data differences between health apps and hospital health records). 对于 OpenAI 而言，Torch 团队在处理和整合分散且相互冲突的医疗数据（例如整合健康 App 和医院健康档案的数据差异）方面拥有宝贵的技术经验。

item.title: 澳大利亚未成年人社媒禁令实施月余，Meta 已封禁逾 54 万账户
item.guid: 澳大利亚未成年人社媒禁令实施月余，Meta-已封禁逾-54-万账户
item.description:
Multiple media outlets report that since Australia officially implemented a social media ban for minors under 16 last December, Meta has banned over 540,000 related accounts and continues to call on the government to re-examine its "one-size-fits-all" regulatory approach. 多家媒体报道，澳大利亚自去年 12 月正式实施 16 岁以下未成年人社交媒体禁令以来，Meta 已封禁超过 54 万个相关账户，并持续呼吁政府重新审视「一刀切」式监管方式。

Meta stated in its latest announcement that, in compliance with the "2024 Online Safety (Social Media Minimum Age) Amendment," it removed approximately 331,000, 173,000, and 40,000 accounts of suspected users under 16 from Instagram, Facebook, and Threads, respectively, between December 4 and 11 last year. Meta 在最新声明中表示，为遵守《2024 网络安全（社交媒体最低年龄）修正案》，其在去年 12 月 4 日至 11 日期间，分别从 Instagram、Facebook 和 Threads 移除约 33.1 万、17.3 万和 4 万个疑似未满 16 岁用户的账户。

The ban officially took effect on December 10 last year, requiring major social media platforms to take "reasonable measures" to prevent users under 16 from registering accounts. Violating companies could face fines of up to 49.5 million AUD. 该禁令自去年 12 月 10 日起正式生效，要求主要社交媒体平台采取「合理措施」阻止未满 16 岁用户注册账户，违规企业最高将面临 4950 万澳元罚款。

The Australian government emphasizes that platforms must utilize the vast amount of user data they possess to ensure compliance and prevent minors from continuing to appear on the platforms. 澳大利亚政府强调，平台必须利用其掌握的大量用户数据来确保合规，避免未成年人继续出现在平台上。

However, multiple media reports indicate that the implementation of the ban faces technical and behavioral challenges. Some teenagers circumvent restrictions by using VPNs, parent accounts, or switching to alternative apps not covered by the regulation, including platforms like Yope, Lemon8, and Discord. 不过，多家媒体报道指出，禁令执行面临技术与行为层面的挑战。部分青少年通过 VPN、父母账户或转向未被纳入监管范围的替代应用规避限制，包括 Yope、Lemon8 及 Discord 等平台。

Other reports indicate that some banned accounts have been reactivated due to technical loopholes or have bypassed age verification processes through simple methods. 另有报道指出，部分被封禁账户在技术漏洞下重新激活，或通过简单方式绕过年龄验证流程。

Meta reiterated in its statement that simply banning accounts cannot fundamentally solve the issue of online safety for minors. It called on governments and industries to collaborate and promote more unified age verification standards, such as moving the verification process to the app store level, to avoid a "whack-a-mole" regulatory dilemma. Meta 在声明中再次强调，单纯封禁并不能从根本上解决未成年人上网安全问题，呼吁政府与行业合作，推动更统一的年龄验证标准，例如将验证环节前置至应用商店层面，以避免「打地鼠式」监管困境。

Meta believes that only by unifying standards at the industry level can consistent safety protection be ensured for teenagers across different applications. Meta 认为，只有在行业层面统一标准，才能确保青少年在不同应用间获得一致的安全保护。

Meanwhile, the ban continues to spark controversy both within Australia and internationally. Supporters believe the policy helps reduce minors' exposure to harmful content and improves mental health; opponents argue that the ban could lead to teenagers losing online community support, including users from minority groups or remote areas. 与此同时，禁令在澳大利亚国内外持续引发争议。支持者认为该政策有助于减少未成年人接触有害内容，改善心理健康状况；反对者则指出，禁令可能导致青少年失去线上社群支持，包括少数族群或偏远地区用户。

According to previous reports, Reddit has filed a lawsuit against the ban, arguing that it restricts teenagers' space for political expression. 据此前报道，Reddit 已对该禁令发起诉讼，认为其限制了青少年的政治表达空间。

item.title: Meta 计划裁员数百人，主要集中于元宇宙部门
item.guid: Meta-计划裁员数百人，主要集中于元宇宙部门
item.description:
According to reports from The Verge and The New York Times , Meta's Reality Labs, which is responsible for virtual reality and metaverse operations, is facing a new round of layoffs, affecting approximately 10% of the team's total headcount. These layoffs are primarily focused on employees working on metaverse-related projects and are expected to begin this week. 据《The Verge》和《纽约时报》报道 ，Meta 旗下负责虚拟现实与元宇宙业务的 Reality Labs 正在面临新一轮裁员，规模约占团队总人数的 10%。此次裁员主要集中在负责元宇宙相关项目的员工，预计将在本周内启动。

The report indicates that Meta CTO Andrew Bosworth has called employees to attend an in-person meeting on Wednesday, which he described as "the most important this year." Bosworth manages Reality Labs, a division that currently has approximately 15,000 employees. 报道指出，Meta 首席技术官 Andrew Bosworth 已召集员工于周三参加一场被他称为「今年最重要」的线下会议。Bosworth 负责管理 Reality Labs，该部门目前约有 1.5 万名员工。

Notably, as early as last December, Bloomberg reported that Meta planned to cut its metaverse budget by approximately 30%, and at the time, external observers already anticipated further adjustments for Reality Labs. 值得注意的是，早在去年 12 月，彭博社曾报道 Meta 计划削减元宇宙预算约 30%，当时外界已预期 Reality Labs 将面临进一步调整。

Meanwhile, Meta's Ray-Ban smart glasses have gained more market attention, gradually becoming a key focus of the company's hardware strategy, while user growth for VR headsets and metaverse platforms continues to be weak. 与此同时，Meta 的 Ray-Ban 智能眼镜在市场上获得更多关注，逐渐成为公司硬件战略的重点，而 VR 头显及元宇宙平台的用户增长则持续乏力。

item.title: Steam 12 月数据：M4 超越 M1 成为 Mac 玩家首选芯片
item.guid: Steam-12-月数据：M4-超越-M1-成为-Mac-玩家首选芯片
item.description:
Recently, Valve, the operator of Steam, released the latest user data for December 2025, showing that Apple's M4 chip has surpassed M1 to become the most popular Apple Silicon chip among Mac players on the Steam platform. Specific data is as follows: 近日，Steam 运营方 Valve 公布了 2025 年 12 月最新用户数据，显示苹果 M4 芯片已超越 M1，成为 Steam 平台上最受 Mac 玩家欢迎的 Apple Silicon 芯片。具体数据如下：

    Devices equipped with the M4 chip account for 19.60% of all Mac computers running Steam;

    The M1 chip, launched in 2020, accounts for 18.06%, ranking second;

    M2 and M3 chips follow with shares of 13.08% and 7.31%, respectively.

It is worth noting that despite the M3 chip introducing features like hardware-accelerated ray tracing, its popularity among gamers is still lower than that of the M2. 值得注意的是，尽管 M3 芯片引入了硬件加速光线追踪等特性，但在玩家群体中的普及度仍不及 M2。

Data indicates that the adoption rate of high-end Max version chips is relatively low, and the Ultra variants used in Mac Studio and Mac Pro did not make it onto the list. 数据指出，高端的 Max 版本芯片普及率相对较低，而 Mac Studio 和 Mac Pro 中使用的 Ultra 变体并未进入榜单。

In contrast, the M4 chip quickly gained dominance due to its widespread application in various models and configurations, including the 24-inch iMac, Mac mini, MacBook Air, and MacBook Pro. 相比之下，M4 芯片因广泛应用于 24 英寸 iMac、Mac mini、MacBook Air 和 MacBook Pro 等多种机型及配置中，从而迅速占据了主导地位。

Regarding the M5 chip released last October, currently only slightly more than 1% of Steam Mac players use it. This is mainly limited by the fact that the M5 is currently only available in the 14-inch MacBook Pro. 关于去年 10 月发布的 M5 芯片，目前仅有略高于 1% 的 Steam Mac 玩家使用。这主要受限于 M5 目前仅搭载于 14 英寸 MacBook Pro。

Additionally, the survey also showed that 16GB of RAM is the most mainstream configuration for Mac gamers, and more than a quarter of users have upgraded to the latest macOS 26 Tahoe system. 此外，调查还显示，16GB 内存是 Mac 玩家最主流的配置，且超过四分之一的用户已升级至最新的 macOS 26 Tahoe 系统。

item.title: 豆包 App 上线 AI 老师「豆包爱学」功能
item.guid: 豆包-App-上线-AI-老师「豆包爱学」功能
item.description:
Yesterday, Doubao officially announced the launch of its new AI teacher feature, "Doubao AI Learn." This feature was first launched in the standalone Doubao AI Learn APP last September and has now been officially integrated into the Doubao App. 昨天，豆包官宣上线全新 AI 老师「豆包爱学」功能。据悉，该功能最早于去年 9 月在独立的豆包爱学 APP 中上线，此次正式整合进豆包 App 中。

After entering "Doubao AI Learn" from the main app's bottom function bar, users can ask questions by typing, speaking, or uploading photos of problems. The AI teacher will answer questions by combining smart whiteboard features, real-time interactive Q&A, and extended knowledge explanations, and users can initiate follow-up questions at any time. 在主应用底部功能栏进入「豆包爱学」后，用户可通过文字、语音或拍照上传题目等方式提问，AI 老师将结合智能板书、实时互动问答与知识延伸讲解进行答疑，还可随时发起追问。

It emphasizes in-depth explanations and heuristic thinking. For example, when explaining "Preface to the Poems Collected from the Orchid Pavilion," the AI teacher will elaborate from multiple dimensions such as the gathering scene, the enduring text, and calligraphic achievements, and pose questions like "If the 'Preface to the Poems Collected from the Orchid Pavilion' did not have such high calligraphic achievements, could it still have been passed down for a thousand years?" to guide users to think further. 该强调深度讲解与启发式思考。例如在讲解《兰亭集序》时，AI 老师会从雅集现场、传世文字、书法成就等多个维度展开，并提出「如果《兰亭集序》没有那么高的书法成就，它还能流传千年吗？」等问题，引导用户进一步思考。

In terms of multimodal capabilities, "Doubao AI Learn" can search for or generate images during explanations, making the presentation of knowledge more visual. 在多模态能力上，「豆包爱学」可在讲解过程中搜索或生成图片，使知识呈现更具可视化效果。

item.title: 💡 张文宏医生：拒绝将 AI 引入病历系统，担忧年轻医生能力退化
item.guid: 💡-张文宏医生：拒绝将-AI-引入病历系统，担忧年轻医生能力退化
item.description:
Recently, Zhang Wenhong, a professor at Fudan University and director of the National Medical Center for Infectious Diseases (Shanghai), explicitly stated at the 10th Anniversary Forum of Gaoshan College in Hong Kong that he opposes the systematic introduction of AI into hospital medical record systems and core diagnostic and treatment processes . 近日，复旦大学教授、国家传染病医学中心（上海）主任张文宏在香港高山书院十周年论坛上明确表示， 反对将 AI 系统性引入医院病历系统及核心诊疗流程 。

Zhang Wenhong pointed out that he personally uses AI for "initial screening" when dealing with a large number of cases, but with long-term accumulated clinical experience, he can quickly identify AI errors. 张文宏指出，他本人会在处理大量病例时使用 AI 进行「初筛」，但凭借长期积累的临床经验，能够快速识别 AI 的错误。

He emphasized that the real risk lies in young doctors potentially lacking systematic training due to reliance on AI, making them unable to judge the correctness of AI diagnoses . 他强调， 真正的风险在于年轻医生可能因依赖 AI 而缺乏系统训练，无法判断 AI 诊断的对错 。

He stated that the growth path of a doctor, from intern to resident to attending physician, essentially relies on the accumulation of a large number of cases and the formation of independent judgment ability. If AI intervenes in the core环节 of medical record writing and diagnosis, it will weaken this capability development. 他表示，医生从实习到住院医师再到主治的成长路径，本质上依赖大量病例积累与独立判断能力的形成，而 AI 若介入病历书写与诊断核心环节，将削弱这一能力培养。

Despite his cautious attitude, Zhang Wenhong did not deny the value of AI in the medical system. He believes that AI plays a positive role in non-core aspects such as literature retrieval, initial case screening, and auxiliary decision-making, but it must ensure that doctors retain final decision-making power and professional leadership. 尽管态度审慎，张文宏并未否定 AI 在医疗体系中的价值。他认为，AI 在文献检索、病例初筛、辅助决策等非核心环节具有积极作用，但必须确保医生保有最终决策权与专业主导权。

Meanwhile, the "precise appointment" model being piloted by Peking Union Medical College Hospital has also been mentioned by several media outlets. This model combines AI initial screening with manual review to improve doctor-patient matching efficiency and reduce misallocation of appointments and waste of resources. 与此同时，北京协和医院正在试点的「精准预约」模式也被多家媒体提及。该模式通过 AI 初筛与人工复核结合的方式，提高医患匹配效率，减少挂号错配与资源浪费。

item.title: OpenAI 首款硬件产品「甜豌豆」曝光：Jony Ive 操刀，意图取代 AirPods
item.guid: OpenAI-首款硬件产品「甜豌豆」曝光：Jony-Ive-操刀，意图取代-AirPods
item.description:
According to information obtained by blogger "Smart Pikachu" from supply chain channels, OpenAI is advancing an audio device project codenamed "Sweetpea." Foxconn has been notified to prepare production capacity for five devices by the fourth quarter of 2028. 据博主「智慧皮卡丘」从供应链渠道获知的消息，OpenAI 正在推进代号「Sweetpea（甜豌豆）」的音频设备项目。富士康已接到通知， 需在 2028 年第四季度前为五款设备做好产能准备。

This "Sweetpea" has been designated as the highest priority by Jony Ive's team. According to the plan, the product will be released around September, with first-year shipments estimated to reach 40 to 50 million units. 这颗「甜豌豆」被 Jony Ive 团队列为最高优先级。按照计划， 产品将在 9 月左右发布， 首年出货量预计达 4000 到 5000 万台。

According to supply chain sources, the hardware design of this device is described as "unique and unprecedented": 根据供应链消息， 这款设备的硬件设计被形容为「独特且前所未见」:

    Next-generation audio device intended to replace AirPods

    Main body made of metal, with a pebble-like shape

    Contains two removable capsule-shaped earbuds, worn behind the ear

    The main processor targets 2nm smartphone-grade chips, with Exynos being the most favored solution

    Custom chips are also being developed, enabling the device to directly execute Siri commands on the iPhone via voice

    Without bone conduction, the bill of materials cost is expected to be very high, with materials and components closer to smartphone levels

It is worth noting that OpenAI acquired io Products, a hardware studio founded by former Apple chief design officer Jony Ive, for approximately $6.5 billion as early as last May, officially putting its hardware strategy on the table. 值得注意的是，OpenAI 早在去年 5 月就以约 65 亿美元收购了前苹果首席设计官 Jony Ive 创办的硬件工作室 io Products， 正式把硬件战略摆上桌面。

CEO Sam Altman has also repeatedly revealed the positioning of OpenAI's hardware. In his view, smartphones are Times Square, with information bombardment and fragmented attention. OpenAI aims to be a lakeside cabin, allowing you to close the door and block out noise when you need to focus. CEO Sam Altman 亦曾多次透露 OpenAI 硬件的定位。在他看来，智能手机是时代广场， 信息轰炸、注意力粉碎，OpenAI 要做的是湖畔小屋， 让你在需要专注时能关上门、屏蔽噪音。

The leak also revealed that Foxconn is positive about OpenAI's hardware project. Having lost all AirPods manufacturing business to Luxshare Precision in the past, Foxconn executives still feel embarrassed, and they see this as a golden opportunity to regain market share in this category. 爆料还透露，富士康对 OpenAI 硬件项目态度积极，当初输给立讯精密、失去全部 AirPods 代工业务， 让富士康高层至今感到尴尬， 他们认为这是重夺该品类市场的黄金机会。

item.title: Anthropic 推出「本地文件智能助手」Cowork
item.guid: Anthropic-推出「本地文件智能助手」Cowork
item.description:
Recently, Anthropic launched a new intelligent agent feature called "Cowork," positioned as a simplified version of Claude Code for non-developers. It is currently available as a research preview on macOS for Claude Max subscribers. 近日，Anthropic 推出全新智能代理功能「Cowork」，定位为面向非开发者的 Claude Code 简化版，目前以研究预览形式在 macOS 端向 Claude Max 订阅用户开放。

According to the introduction, Cowork is built on the Claude Agent SDK. Its core capability is to allow users to specify local folders for Claude, enabling it to read, edit, or create files and perform continuous tasks with greater autonomy. 据介绍，Cowork 基于 Claude Agent SDK 构建，核心能力是让用户为 Claude 指定本地文件夹，使其能够读取、编辑或创建文件，并以更高自主性执行连续任务。

Compared to Claude Code, which requires a command-line environment, Cowork has a lower setup threshold and is aimed at a wider range of daily work scenarios, such as organizing downloaded files, generating expense reports from screenshots, or creating draft reports from scattered notes. 相比需要命令行环境的 Claude Code，Cowork 的设置门槛更低，面向更广泛的日常工作场景，例如整理下载文件、从截图生成报销表格、或根据零散笔记生成报告初稿等。

Anthropic stated that Cowork's design inspiration comes from the trend of many users employing Claude Code for non-coding tasks, and thus hopes to extend intelligent agent capabilities to the general user base in a more user-friendly way. Anthropic 表示，Cowork 的设计灵感来自大量用户将 Claude Code 用于非编码任务的趋势，因此希望以更易用的方式将智能代理能力扩展至普通用户群体。

Cowork allows users to append instructions at any point during task execution, and can leverage existing interfaces to access external information or work with the Claude browser plugin to handle browser-related tasks. Cowork 支持用户在任务执行过程中随时追加指令，并可利用现有接口访问外部信息，或与 Claude 浏览器插件配合处理浏览器相关任务。

In terms of usage, Cowork will ask for user confirmation before executing important operations, but Anthropic also emphasizes its potentially destructive capabilities, such as deleting local files, reminding users to provide clear instructions and be wary of prompt injection risks. Anthropic points out that agent safety remains an active research area within the industry. 在使用方式上，Cowork 会在执行重要操作前征求用户确认，但 Anthropic 也强调其具备删除本地文件等潜在破坏性能力，提醒用户提供明确指令并警惕提示词注入风险。Anthropic 指出，智能体的安全性仍是行业内的活跃研究方向。

Cowork is currently only available to Claude Max users; other users can join a waitlist. Anthropic stated that it will continue to improve based on feedback from the research preview phase and plans to support cross-device synchronization and the Windows platform in the future. Cowork 当前仅向 Claude Max 用户开放，其他用户可加入候补名单。Anthropic 表示将根据研究预览阶段的反馈持续改进，并计划未来支持跨设备同步及 Windows 平台。

item.title: 百川智能发布开源医疗模型 Baichuan‑M3，性能超越 GPT‑5.2
item.guid: 百川智能发布开源医疗模型-Baichuan‑M3，性能超越-GPT‑5.2
item.description:
Yesterday, Baichuan Intelligence officially released its new generation open-source medical enhanced large language model, Baichuan-M3. 昨天，百川智能正式发布新一代开源医疗增强大语言模型 Baichuan‑M3。

The official statement indicates that the model achieved first place in multiple authoritative evaluations, including consultation capability, medical hallucination control, Healthbench, and Healthbench Hard, with overall performance surpassing OpenAI GPT-5.2 and exceeding human doctors in all test segments. 官方表示，该模型在问诊能力、医疗幻觉控制以及 Healthbench、Healthbench Hard 等多项权威评测中均取得第一名成绩，整体表现超越 OpenAI GPT‑5.2，并在所有测试环节中超过人类医生。

Wang Xiaochuan, founder and CEO of Baichuan Intelligence, recalled at a media briefing that since the company's establishment in 2023, despite external doubts about AI technology, the team has always believed that the wave of technology is irreversible. 百川智能创始人兼 CEO 王小川在媒体沟通会上回顾，自 2023 年公司成立以来，尽管外界对 AI 技术存在质疑，但团队始终认为技术浪潮已不可逆转。

He mentioned that the emergence of DeepSeek last year significantly increased the acceptance of AI among doctors and made the public more willing to regard AI as a more reliable tool than traditional search. 他提到，去年 DeepSeek 的出现显著提升了医生群体对 AI 的接受度，也让大众更愿意将 AI 视为比传统搜索更可靠的工具。

With international companies like OpenAI and Anthropic recently accelerating their deployment in the medical field, he believes that AI in healthcare has entered the application phase, becoming one of the most valuable core scenarios for AI technology. 随着 OpenAI、Anthropic 等国际企业近期加速布局医疗领域，他认为 AI 医疗已进入应用阶段，成为 AI 技术最具价值的核心场景之一。

Wang Xiaochuan also mentioned Ant Group's product "Afu," which has recently gained attention, believing that its widespread adoption in public spaces indicates that AI services are rapidly permeating daily life. He emphasized that healthcare, as the "crown jewel" of AI, is moving from technological breakthroughs to large-scale application. 王小川还提到近期受到关注的蚂蚁集团产品「阿福」，认为其在公共空间的普及说明 AI 服务正在快速渗透日常生活。他强调，医疗作为 AI 的「皇冠明珠」，正从技术突破迈向大规模应用。

item.title: 荣耀 ROBOT PHONE 亮相 CES 2026：首款「手机机器人」斩获多项外媒大奖
item.guid: 荣耀-ROBOT-PHONE-亮相-CES-2026：首款「手机机器人」斩获多项外媒大奖
item.description:
Recently, at CES 2026 held in Las Vegas, USA, Honor officially unveiled the world's first "phone robot," the Honor ROBOT PHONE, and won multiple media awards for the product. 日前，在美国拉斯维加斯举办的 CES 2026 上，荣耀正式展示了全球首款「手机机器人」荣耀 ROBOT PHONE，并凭借该产品斩获多项媒体大奖 。

As a key product implementing Honor's "Alpha Strategy," the Honor ROBOT PHONE adopts a phone robot gimbal architecture and AI interactive experience, aiming to break the boundaries between traditional mobile phones and smart hardware, transforming the user experience from "people operating devices" to "devices actively serving people." 作为荣耀「阿尔法战略」的关键落地产品，荣耀 ROBOT PHONE 采用了手机机器人云台架构与 AI 交互体验，旨在打破传统手机与智能硬件的边界，将用户体验从「人操作设备」转变为「设备主动服务人」 。

After the product's debut, CNET praised it as "Most Futuristic Tech" and "the coolest, most unconventional design seen in recent years"; 在该产品亮相后，CNET 评价其为「最具未来感科技（Most Futuristic Tech）」及「近年来见过的最不按常理出牌的酷炫设计」；

Android Police awarded it the "BEST OF CES 2026" award, recognizing its innovation in AI terminal form factors; GadgetFlow and Geekspin also included it in their "Best of CES" lists. Android Police 授予其「BEST OF CES 2026」奖项，肯定了其在 AI 终端形态上的创新；GadgetFlow 与 Geekspin 也将其列入「CES 最佳产品」榜单 。

In terms of market performance, Honor revealed that its global smartphone shipments exceeded 71 million units for the first time last year, a year-on-year increase of 9%. 在市场表现方面，荣耀透露去年全球手机发货量首次突破 7100 万台，同比增长 9%。

Among these, overseas market sales grew by 47%, accounting for over 50% for the first time. The official statement indicates that with the launch of the Honor Magic V5 and the first self-evolving AI native phone, the Magic8 series, its high-end image and market share in markets like Europe are continuously improving. 其中，海外市场销量实现了 47% 的增长，占比首次超过 50%。官方表示，随着荣耀 Magic V5 及首款自进化 AI 原生手机 Magic8 系列的推出，其在欧洲等市场的高端形象与市场份额正在持续提升 。

Honor confirmed that at the Mobile World Congress (MWC 2026) held in Barcelona, Spain, this March, Honor will reveal more product details and functional experiences of the Honor ROBOT PHONE. 荣耀方面确认，在今年 3 月于西班牙巴塞罗那举行的世界移动通信大会（MWC 2026）上，荣耀将披露荣耀 ROBOT PHONE 的更多产品细节及功能体验 。

item.title: 潮牌交易平台 StockX 发布 2026 趋势报告：近 200 品牌创销售新高
item.guid: 潮牌交易平台-StockX-发布-2026-趋势报告：近-200-品牌创销售新高
item.description:
Recently, StockX, a US-based trading platform for pre-owned streetwear products, released its seventh "Big Facts: Current Culture Index 2026" trend report, systematically reviewing key growth brands in the secondary market last year and providing consumer and cultural predictions for 2026. 近日，美国二手潮牌产品交易平台 StockX 发布第七份《Big Facts: Current Culture Index 2026》趋势报告，系统梳理去年二级市场的关键增长品牌，并给出 2026 年的消费与文化预测。

The report shows that nearly 200 brands achieved new annual sales highs on the platform last year, and the secondary market's influence continued to expand in categories such as sneakers, apparel, accessories, electronics, and collectibles. 报告显示，去年近 200 个品牌在平台创下年度销售额新高，二级市场在运动鞋、服饰、配饰、电子产品与收藏品等领域的影响力持续扩大。

In the sneaker category, Nike, Jordan, Adidas, New Balance, and Asics were the top-selling brands on the platform for the third consecutive year. The average resale prices for Nike and Jordan increased by 5% and 6% year-on-year, respectively, showing signs of recovery. 在运动鞋品类中，耐克、乔丹、阿迪达斯、New Balance 与亚瑟士连续第三年成为平台销量最高的品牌。耐克与乔丹的平均转售价格分别同比上涨 5% 与 6%，呈现复苏迹象。

Meanwhile, Mizuno became the fastest-growing sneaker brand last year with a 124% year-on-year increase, while Maison Mihara Yasuhiro, Saucony, and Salomon also maintained strong growth momentum. 与此同时，Mizuno 以 124% 的同比增幅成为去年增长最快的运动鞋品牌，Maison Mihara Yasuhiro、Saucony 与 Salomon 也保持强劲增长势头。

In the non-sneaker category, UGG continued to be the top-selling brand on the platform, while Nike became the fastest-growing non-sneaker brand with an astounding 5811% increase, driven by explosive demand for its recovery footwear, ReactX Rejuven8. 在非运动鞋类中，UGG 继续保持平台销量冠军，而 Nike 凭借恢复类鞋款 ReactX Rejuven8 的爆发性需求，成为增长最快的非运动鞋品牌，增幅高达 5811%。

In apparel, Uniqlo became the fastest-growing brand due to collaborations with Needles and KAWS, with sales increasing by 667% year-on-year. SKIMS ranked third with a 196% increase. Fear of God was the most traded apparel brand on the platform for the fourth consecutive year, followed closely by Supreme, Nike, and Yeezy. 服饰方面，优衣库因与 Needles 与 KAWS 的合作成为增长最快的品牌，销售额同比增长 667%。SKIMS 以 196% 的增幅位列第三。Fear of God 连续第四年成为平台交易量最高的服饰品牌，Supreme、耐克与椰子紧随其后。

In the collectibles sector, Pop Mart surpassed Lego to become the most traded collectibles brand on the platform, reflecting the continuous rise of "adult toy" culture. 收藏品领域中，泡泡玛特超越乐高成为平台交易量最高的收藏品牌，反映「成年玩具」文化的持续升温。

In electronics, Canon was one of the most significant growth brands last year, increasing by over 6000% compared to the previous year, with the PowerShot G7 X Mark III becoming the platform's best-selling electronic product. 电子产品方面，佳能成为去年增长最显著的品牌之一，较前年增长超过 6000%，其中 PowerShot G7 X Mark III 成为平台最畅销电子产品。

The accessories market continues to be driven by scarcity. Sprayground entered the top five in both sales and growth lists, with sales increasing by 287% year-on-year. Louis Vuitton rose to fourth place due to strong demand for its collaboration series with Takashi Murakami. 配饰市场依旧由稀缺性驱动。Sprayground 同时进入销量与增长榜前五，销售额同比增长 287%。Louis Vuitton 因与村上隆的合作系列需求旺盛，排名上升至第四。

Looking ahead to this year, StockX believes that global sporting events will be a significant force driving consumer trends. 展望今年，StockX 认为全球体育赛事将成为推动消费趋势的重要力量。

The 2026 World Cup is expected to further boost the influence of football culture in the United States, while the Milan Olympics may drive cross-industry collaborations between sports and fashion. Bad Bunny will also reach key milestones this year, including a Super Bowl halftime show and the release of his first Adidas original signature shoe. 2026 年世界杯预计将进一步提升足球文化在美国的影响力，而米兰奥运会则可能推动运动与时尚的跨界合作。Bad Bunny 也将在今年迎来关键节点，包括超级碗中场秀与首款阿迪达斯原创签名鞋的发布。

StockX also predicts that the re-commerce trend in the secondary market will continue to accelerate this year, driven by the growth of live shopping, vintage trends, and price-sensitive consumption. StockX 还预测，随着直播购物、复古潮流与价格敏感消费的增长，二级市场的再商务趋势将在今年继续加速。

item.title: 机构：腾讯蝉联全球手游发行商冠军，《王者荣耀》收入逾 20 亿美元创历史新高
item.guid: 机构：腾讯蝉联全球手游发行商冠军，《王者荣耀》收入逾-20-亿美元创历史新高
item.description:
Yesterday, research firm Sensor Tower released its latest data, showing that after several years of adjustments, the global mobile game market will once again show steady growth in 2025, with full-year revenue slightly increasing by 1.3% year-on-year to $82.3 billion. 昨天，调研机构 Sensor Tower 发布最新数据，显示 2025 年全球手游市场在经历连续数年的调整后再度呈现稳健增长，全年收入同比小幅上涨 1.3% 至 823 亿美元。

Overseas market App Store and Google Play mobile game revenue increased by 2% year-on-year, reaching $69.8 billion. 海外市场 App Store 与 Google Play 手游收入同比增长 2%，达到 698 亿美元。

At the publisher level, Tencent, thanks to the stable performance of core products such as "Honor of Kings," "Game for Peace," and "PUBG MOBILE," has topped the global mobile game publisher revenue list for many consecutive years. 在发行商层面，腾讯凭借《王者荣耀》《和平精英》《PUBG MOBILE》等核心产品的稳定表现，连续多年蝉联全球手游发行商收入榜冠军。

    "Honor of Kings" full-year revenue in 2025 (excluding third-party Android channels in mainland China) exceeded $2 billion, a 5% year-on-year increase, setting a new historical high and further solidifying its position as a commercial benchmark for national-level MOBA games;

    "Delta Force" full-year revenue soared 29 times year-on-year, ranking 5th on the mainland iOS mobile game revenue list and 29th on the global revenue list last year, becoming Tencent's fastest-growing mobile game product last year.

Besides Tencent, DotEmu achieved explosive growth in 2025, with global revenue surging by 87% year-on-year, rising to second place on the global publisher revenue list. Its flagship product "Whiteout Survival" saw overseas revenue increase by 32% last year to over $1.65 billion, topping the overseas mobile game revenue list for two consecutive years. 除腾讯外，点点互动在 2025 年实现爆发式增长，全球收入同比激增 87%，跃升至全球发行商收入榜亚军。其旗舰产品《Whiteout Survival》去年海外收入上涨 32% 至超过 16.5 亿美元，连续两年蝉联出海手游收入榜冠军。

In addition, "Tasty Travels: Merge Game," a merge mobile game combining "world travel + gourmet cooking" themes, saw its revenue skyrocket 28 times year-on-year, entering the TOP30 overseas mobile game revenue list for the first time and becoming a highlight of DotEmu's diversified layout. 此外，融合「环游世界+美食烹饪」题材的合成手游《Tasty Travels: Merge Game》收入同比暴涨 28 倍，首次进入出海手游收入榜 TOP30，成为点点互动多元化布局的亮点。

The report also pointed out that in 2025, the global merge mobile game sector continued its rapid expansion, with its market size exceeding $2.4 billion, a robust year-on-year increase of 95%. 报告同时指出，2025 年全球合成手游赛道继续保持高速扩张，市场规模突破 24 亿美元，同比劲增 95%。

Lemon Microfun, with products like "Gossip Harbor," "Seaside Escape," and "Flambé: Merge & Cook," saw its revenue surge by 165% last year, becoming the revenue champion in the merge game sector. 柠檬微趣凭借《Gossip Harbor》《Seaside Escape》《Flambé: Merge & Cook》等产品，去年收入激增 165%，成为合成赛道收入冠军。

In the strategy game genre, the "SLG+X" hybrid gameplay has become a key trend driving growth. 在策略游戏领域，「SLG+X」融合玩法成为推动增长的关键趋势。

Florere Game's two 4X strategy mobile games, "Last Z: Survival Shooter" and "Dark War: Survival," generated revenues of $470 million and $380 million respectively last year, driving the publisher's revenue to soar 20 times year-on-year and entering the top ten of the publisher revenue list for the first time. Florere Game 旗下《Last Z: Survival Shooter》《Dark War: Survival》两款 4X 策略手游去年收入分别达到 4.7 亿美元与 3.8 亿美元，带动发行商收入同比飙升 20 倍，首次进入发行商收入榜前十。

Furthermore, "Wuthering Waves" celebrated its second anniversary last year. Thanks to frequent version updates and character content iterations, its full-year revenue increased by 66% year-on-year, making it one of the fastest-growing ACGN mobile games last year. 此外，《鸣潮》在去年迎来上线两周年，凭借高频版本更新与角色内容迭代，全年收入同比上涨 66%，成为去年增长最快的二次元手游之一。

Overall, mainland mobile game publishers continued their strong performance in the global market in 2025, with the TOP30 publishers collectively raking in $23.3 billion, accounting for 35% of the global TOP100 publishers' revenue, largely consistent with the previous year. 整体来看，2025 年大陆手游发行商在全球市场继续保持强势表现，TOP30 发行商合计吸金 233 亿美元，占全球 TOP100 发行商收入的 35%，与前一年基本持平。

item.title: 早高峰座位被标价 1.99 元，上海地铁回应「不允许」
item.guid: 早高峰座位被标价-1.99-元，上海地铁回应「不允许」
item.description:
Recently, the "1.99 yuan seat-sitting service" that appeared on Shanghai Metro has attracted widespread attention. 近日，上海地铁出现的「1.99 元代坐」服务引发广泛关注。

Many netizens discovered on second-hand trading platforms that some sellers offer "seat-holding" services at prices ranging from 1.99 yuan to 50 yuan per month, mainly on crowded morning rush hour lines such as Line 2, Line 9, Line 10, Line 13, and Line 18. Most sellers claim to board at the starting station and promise to give the seat to the buyer at a designated stop. 多名网友在二手交易平台发现，有卖家以 1.99 元至包月 50 元不等的价格提供「代占座」服务，主要集中在 2 号线、9 号线、10 号线、13 号线、18 号线等早高峰拥挤线路。卖家多自称从起点站上车，并承诺在指定站点将座位让给买家。

The core model of these transactions is "pre-occupying a seat - privately transferring the right to use," essentially privatizing a public resource, public transport seats, and reselling them. 这类交易的核心模式均为「提前占座—私下转让使用权」，本质是将公共交通座位这一公共资源私有化并进行二次售卖。

Cover News pointed out that this behavior erodes public space order and directly infringes upon the equal right of ordinary passengers to use public resources. Southern Weekend further analyzed that this practice actually constructs a "secondary market for seat usage rights," which is a typical act of hoarding public resources for profit. 封面新闻指出，这种行为侵蚀公共空间秩序，直接挤压普通乘客的平等使用权。南方周末则进一步分析称，这种做法实际上构建了一个「座位使用权二级市场」，属于典型的囤积公共资源牟利行为。

Shanghai Metro has explicitly stated that such behavior is not allowed. Several lawyers also pointed out that paid seat occupation is suspected of violating the "Law of the People's Republic of China on Public Security Administration Punishments" and constitutes an illegal act of disturbing public order. 上海地铁方面已明确表示不允许此类行为。多名律师也指出，有偿占座涉嫌违反《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法》，属于扰乱公共秩序的违法行为。

Reports indicate that these "seat-sitting" services also feature differentiated pricing, such as surge pricing during peak hours, discounts on less popular lines, and even monthly subscription services, showing a certain trend towards scale. However, due to the lack of legal protection for these transactions, both buyers and sellers face risks of financial loss and information leakage. 报道显示，这类「代坐」服务还出现了差异化定价，例如高峰加价、冷门线路打折等，甚至出现包月服务，呈现出一定规模化趋势。但由于交易缺乏法律保障，买卖双方均面临财产损失与信息泄露风险。

Cover News believes that the public welfare nature of public resources should not be eroded by profit logic; Southern Weekend, on the other hand, pointed out that the subway, as a public service, should not lean towards pure commercialization. 封面新闻认为，公共资源的公益属性不应被盈利逻辑侵蚀；南方周末则指出，地铁作为公共服务，不宜向纯商业化方向靠拢。

Currently, multiple parties are calling on subway operators and public security departments to strengthen patrols and law enforcement, while also enhancing passengers' awareness of the fairness of public resources, to jointly curb the spread of such phenomena. 目前，多方呼吁地铁运营方与公安部门加强巡查与执法，同时提升乘客对公共资源公平性的认知，共同遏制此类现象的蔓延。

item.title: 2025 Letterboxd 榜单公布：《链锯人》与《罪人》领跑多项第一
item.guid: 2025-Letterboxd-榜单公布：《链锯人》与《罪人》领跑多项第一
item.description:
The user-rated film review website Letterboxd recently announced its 2025 annual list results, with the highest-rated film being "Chainsaw Man The Movie: Reze Arc." The film also simultaneously took home multiple annual first-place awards, including "Animation," "Asian Film," and "Directorial Debut." 用户打分影评网站 Letterboxd 近日公布了 2025 年度榜单结果，最高分电影由《链锯人 剧场版：蕾塞篇》斩获，该片还同时拿下「动画」「亚洲电影」及「导演出道作」等多项年度第一。

Another outstanding film, "The Sinner," received titles such as "Highest-Rated Horror Film" and "Most Popular Film." Watchmen Hollywood summarized some of the nominees as follows: 另一部表现突出的影片《罪人》则获得「最高得分恐怖片」及「最受欢迎电影」等头衔。守望好莱坞总结部分入围名单如下：

    Highest-Rated Film (General Category): "Chainsaw Man The Movie: Reze Arc"

    Highest-Rated Thriller: "No Other Choice"

    Highest-Rated Comedy: "Marty Supreme"

    Highest-Rated Drama: "The Voice of Hind Rajab"

    Highest-Rated Horror Film: "The Sinner"

    Highest-Rated Romance Film: "Hamnet"

    Highest-Rated Action/Adventure Film: "Once More Into The Fray"

    Highest-Rated Film by a Female Director / Expanded Gender Director: "The Voice of Hind Rajab"

    Most "Low-Rated but Loved" Film: "War of the Worlds"

    Most "High-Rated but Little-Seen" Film: "Castration Film Anthology i. Trap"

    Most Obsessively Rewatched Film: "Superman"

    Most Watched Male Actor: Willem Dafoe

    Most Watched Female Actor: Scarlett Johansson

Matthew Buchanan, co-founder and CEO of Letterboxd, stated that the viewing preferences of the platform's users show a high degree of diversity, with everything from student animation to Asian thrillers gaining attention. He said, "The community proves that when audiences have the tools to discover and share, they will find stories that truly belong to them." Letterboxd 联合创始人兼 CEO Matthew Buchanan 表示，平台用户的观影偏好呈现出高度多元化，从学生动画到亚洲惊悚片都能获得关注，他称「社区证明了当观众拥有发现与分享的工具时，他们会找到真正属于自己的故事」。

item.title: 《非传统浪漫关系》定档 1 月 31 日
item.guid: 《非传统浪漫关系》定档-1-月-31-日
item.description:
The film "Unconventional Romantic Relationships" yesterday released its "Romantic Reconstruction" version of the release poster and trailer, officially announcing its nationwide release on January 31. 电影《非传统浪漫关系》昨天发布「浪漫重构」版定档海报及预告，正式宣布将于 1 月 31 日全国上映。

The film focuses on new types of intimate relationships among contemporary urban men and women, breaking away from traditional romantic comedy tropes. 影片将镜头对准当代都市男女的新型亲密关系，打破传统爱情喜剧套路。

The plot revolves around Zhu Junhao (played by Zhu Yanmanzi) and Gong Xi (played by Ren Bin), a pair of "divorce buddies." After drinking, they promise to find partners for each other, forming a "matchmaker alliance against the dating scene." With the addition of blind date girl Ji Xiaoshu (played by Zhao Xiaotang) and ex-boyfriend Xiang Han (played by Wang Tianfang), the four engage in an emotional game in the ancient town. 剧情围绕祝君好（朱颜曼滋 饰）与龚玺（任彬 饰）这对「离婚搭子」展开，两人在酒后互许承诺为对方寻找对象，组成「对抗路媒人联盟」。随着相亲女纪小舒（赵小棠 饰）与前任向涵（王天放 饰）的加入，四人在古镇展开情感博弈。

item.title: 《为我的心动买单》定档 5 月 20 日
item.guid: 《为我的心动买单》定档-5-月-20-日
item.description:
The urban romantic comedy film "Pay for My Heartbeat" officially announced its release date yesterday, scheduled to hit theaters on May 20, 2026. 都市爱情喜剧电影《为我的心动买单》于昨天正式官宣定档，计划于 2026 年 5 月 20 日上映。

The film primarily tells the story of workplace colleagues Xia Lin (played by Qi Wei) and Tan Jie (played by Allen), and the conflicts and emotional entanglements that arise from their differing views. 影片主要讲述了夏临（戚薇 饰）与谭杰（艾伦 饰）这对职场同事因观念相悖产生的冲突与情感纠葛。

In the story's setting, the two characters represent two distinct approaches to emotional handling: "cutting losses and breaking up" and "repairing relationships." The film attempts to explore issues of risk and reward in contemporary urban relationships through the dynamic between this "bickering couple." 故事设定中，两人分别代表「止损分手」与「修复关系」两种截然不同的情感处理方式，影片试图通过这对「欢喜冤家」的博弈，探讨当代都市情感中关于风险与回报的议题。
